## 1. Rats

```{r}
rats <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/njehh/IODS-project/master/Data/rats.csv")
rats$ID <- as.factor(rats$ID)
rats$Group <- as.factor(rats$Group)
glimpse(rats)
```

```{r}
ggplot(rats, aes(x = Time, y = Weight, group = ID, colour = Group)) +
  geom_line(linewidth = 0.8) +
  ylab("Weight (grams)") +
  scale_x_continuous(name = "Time (days)", breaks = seq(0, 60, 10))
```
```{r}
ggplot(rats, aes(x = Group, y = Weight, colour = Group)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Weight (grams)")
```
It seems that there is clear difference in weight between the groups.

```{r}
rats %>% 
  filter(Group != 3) %>% 
  t.test(Weight ~ Group, data = .)
```
```{r}
rats %>% 
  filter(Group != 2) %>% 
  t.test(Weight ~ Group, data = .)
```
```{r}
rats %>% 
  filter(Group != 1) %>% 
  t.test(Weight ~ Group, data = .)
```






## 2. BPRS

```{r}
BPRS <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/njehh/IODS-project/master/Data/bprs.csv")
BPRS$treatment <- as.factor(BPRS$treatment)
BPRS$subject <- as.factor(BPRS$subject)
glimpse(BPRS)
```


```{r}
ggplot(BPRS, aes(x = week, y = bprs, linetype =subject, colour=subject)) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_linetype_manual(values = rep(1:10, times=4)) +
  theme(legend.position = "none") + 
  facet_grid(. ~ treatment, labeller = label_both)

```
